title: #72 #RHOC Recap with Brice Sander (Entertainment Tonight) + #RHOD, More HomeGoods, and Award Show Presenters
itunes:title: #72 #RHOC Recap with Brice Sander (Entertainment Tonight) + #RHOD, More HomeGoods, and Award Show Presenters
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Housewives historian Brice Sander (Entertainment Tonight) to recap The Real Housewives of Orange County. Danny also recaps Real Housewives of Dallas, talks about his weekend trip to HG, and gives his take on award show presenters.#RHOC-...
description:
Danny welcomes Housewives historian Brice Sander (Entertainment Tonight) to recap The Real Housewives of Orange County. Danny also recaps Real Housewives of Dallas, talks about his weekend trip to HG, and gives his take on award show presenters.

#RHOC- 15:05

#RHOD- 48:47


*For bonus episodes & to support this show, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
